Resort Farmviilla Facilitates Customers With Best in Class Hospitality By Providing Numbers Of Amenities To Make Your Experience Better. Resort is Located between Greenery For Calming & Soothing Stay For A Comfortable Weekend With Your Beloved Family & Friends. Grab This Chance To Enjoy All Available Amenities At Resort At Affordable Prices. Farmvilla Welcomes You WholeHeartledly.

Swimming Pool

REFRESHING CHLORINE BATHING WATER CLEANED REGULARLY TO RELIEVE STRESS OF WORK IN WEEKENDS. PLAY POOL GAMES WITH FAMILIES OR JUST ENJOY THE COOL WATER.

Restaurant

ENJOY FROM TRADITIONAL FOOD TO VARIETY OF LOCAL AND INTERNATIONAL CUISINES. EXPERIENCED CHEFS, ATTENTIVE SERVING STAFF AND HYGIENIC PLACE.

Gymnesium

INDOOR GYMNASIUM FOR EXERCISE & HEALTHY LIFESTYLE TO APPEAL TO YOUNGSTERS. LATEST EQUIPMENT AND CALMING ENVIRONMENT TO FOCUS PROPERLY WITHOUT DISTRACTIONS

Indoor Games

SNOOKER, CARROM, TABLE TENNIS AND MANY OTHER INDOOR GAMES TO PLAY WITH FAMILY. PLAYING GAMES STRENGTHENS THE BONDS AND IS GOOD FOR HEALTH AS WELL.

Conference Hall

FARMVILLA HAVE SEPARATE FACILITY FOR BUSINESS INDIVIDUAL & CORPORATES. DEDICATED PROJECTOR AND SITTING AREA FOR MEETINGS AND BANQUET.

Rent Audi For Events & Weddings.

Rent Now

Amenities

At Resort Farmvilla You Can Enjoy Vast Variety Of World Class Amenities To Further Increase The Satisfaction of Our Customers To Enjoy Their Weekends With Family. Farm Villa Is Best Resort In Bhuj.

Book Us For Wedding

Looking For All In One Wedding Solutions? Choose Resort Farmvilla For Your Once In A Lifetime Event Of Marriage. Farmvilla Has Green Open Lawn For Marriage To Take Place Along With Proper Management For All Necessary Services Including Food To Parking To Allocate Large Number Of Peoples To Further Increase The Joy Of Wedding.
Click For Details

Accomodation

Enjoy The Stay At Resort FarmVilla's Premium Rooms. Architecture Is Based On Kutchi Bhunga ( cottage) House. Despite The Exterior, The Interior Furnishing & Decors Are Up-To-Date With Modern Standards And Radiates Comfortable Warm Aura. Room Service Is Friendly And Room Consists All The Necessary Amenities. All This At Relatively Affordable Price. Come Visit Us Today.

TestiMonials

Resort Farm Villa
4.4
Laxit Patel
06:56 11 Jul 19
Best place for weekends with families. resort have many amenities including indoor Gymnasium, Swimming Pool and Party Plot. Resort Have Friendly Staff and Serves Traditional Cuisine along With Many Type Of Other Foods. I had Good Time Here And I Recommend It To Everyone.
Rekha Vora
15:23 28 Jun 19
Happy to come here... Service is very good. Helping staff... Good location
Mohit Sudan
10:45 10 Jun 19
Nice place to enjoy with kids. It's a pet friendly property,so one can bring the pets along. They've a small and safe swimming pool.resort is surrounded by mango orchards .the only reason I didn't give five star is that there is no proper restaurant.one gets tea and coffee but for food, they get it packed from outside for you. Otherwise the management is good and helping.It's around 8km from City and one doesn't get cabs easily. Cottages are better place to stay than rooms. Nearby village bhujodi is good for handicraft purchasing
Mehul Maharaj
14:20 29 May 19
Felling amazing here with swimming pool. Bathroom Facility Changing Room Facility And Much more I experienced swimming pool here, water quality is so good very clean. Kids have separate pool and adults have separate pool.
Harshal Patel
07:45 08 Mar 19
The property gives you "a small farm house" feel with a clean and calm environment. Existing Swimming Pool is very small. They should be expand pool area. Hotel Location is very prime area. on the National Highway. The only thing Hotel should improve is PARKING SPACE. well managed property. I liked it.
